text: Carlos Pinto may refer to: * Carlos Pinto (journalist), Chilean journalist and television presenter * Carlos Pinto (equestrian), Portuguese Olympic dressage rider * Carlos Pinto, Portuguese professional football coach and former player * Carlos Mota Pinto, Portuguese professor and politician * Carlos Maia Pinto, Prime Minister of Portugal, 1921 * Carlos Pinto Rosas, Mexican footballer * Carlos Heriberto Pinto, Mexican footballer
title: Carlos Pinto
